snippet: Everything around and within me is partly because of his fatherly advice, his example and even the fact that he could get impatient and stubborn.
abstract: Lucy Schulte Danziger Modern Love column recalling her father, who drowned on Father's Day, argues there is no right way to grieve.
lead_paragraph: Everything around and within me is partly because of his fatherly advice, his example and even the fact that he could get impatient and stubborn.

headline.seo: Sad News Like a Warm Hug Goodbye
headline.main: Sad News Like a Warm Hug Goodbye
headline.print_headline: Sad News Like a Warm Hug Goodbye
